iti58:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti58:2.3: Craving for sensual pleasures, craving to continue existence, and craving to end existence.
iti58:3.1: “Bound by craving, minds full of desire
iti58:3.2: for rebirth in this or that state,
iti58:3.3: yoked by Māra’s yoke, these people
iti58:3.4: find no sanctuary from the yoke.
iti58:4.1: Those who have given up craving,
iti58:4.2: rid of craving for rebirth in this or that state,
iti58:4.3: they in this world have truly crossed over,
iti58:4.4: having reached the ending of defilements.”
iti58:5.1: This too is a matter that was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
